messages.author: Chief Engineer's Desk
messages.body: Free lessons on setting up the engine now available, please come and dont be a safety hazard!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to climate change, a whoop of [REDACTED] have migrated into the [REDACTED].

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Mining Dock.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: PLEASE DRAG LIGHTS AROUND THE STAITON
